meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the September 25, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize payment of annual membership fees
agenda_items.description: Authorize payment of annual membership fees and continuation of arrangements for various organizations.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of lawsuit
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Jacolby Douglas v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of lawsuit
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Kerry Holmes and Zandra Holmes v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize preparation of plans for bond issuances
agenda_items.description: Authorize the preparation of plans and payment of potential future costs for bond issuances.

agenda_items.title: Authorize publication of Notice of Intention to Issue Certificates of Obligation
agenda_items.description: Authorize the publication of Notice of Intention to Issue Certificates of Obligation.

agenda_items.title: Authorize preparation of plans for revenue refunding bonds
agenda_items.description: Authorize the preparation of plans for an issuance of Waterworks and Sewer System Revenue Refunding Bonds.

agenda_items.title: Authorize acceptance of grant for Auto Theft Taskforce
agenda_items.description: Authorize acceptance of a grant from the Motor Vehicle Crime Prevention Authority for the FY 2025 Dallas Auto Theft Taskforce Grant.

agenda_items.title: Authorize acceptance of grant for Victims of Crime Act
agenda_items.description: Authorize acceptance of a grant from the U.S. Department of Justice for the FY 2025 Victims of Crime Act Victim Services DPD Grant.

agenda_items.title: Authorize acceptance of grant for Catalytic Converter Grant
agenda_items.description: Authorize acceptance of a grant from the Motor Vehicle Crime Prevention Authority for the FY25 SB224 Catalytic Converter Grant.
